tools.name: CreatePresentation
tools.description:
Create a new PowerPoint presentation in OneDrive.

The presentation will be created with a title slide containing the specified title.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title for the new presentation.

parameters.name: parent_folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder to create the presentation in. If not provided, the presentation will be created in the root of the user's OneDrive.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: CreateSlide
tools.description:
Append a new slide to the end of an existing PowerPoint presentation in OneDrive.

The slide will be added at the end of the presentation. Both title and body
are optional to support layouts like BLANK or TITLE_ONLY.

For presentations larger than 4 MB, the upload uses a resumable session.
Concurrency protection (etag check) is best-effort in that case, since
Microsoft Graph upload sessions do not support If-Match headers.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the PowerPoint presentation to add a slide to.

parameters.name: slide_title
parameters.description: The title for the new slide. Optional for layouts like BLANK.

parameters.name: slide_body
parameters.description: The body content for the new slide. Supports markdown: **bold**, *italic*, __underline__, and bullet points (- item, indented with spaces for nesting). Optional for layouts like TITLE_ONLY or BLANK.

parameters.name: layout
parameters.description: The layout to use for the slide. For TWO_CONTENT layout, use create_two_content_slide.

output.description: The updated presentation details with new slide info.

documentationChunks.content:
## Overview

Arcade.dev LLM tools for Microsoft PowerPoint enable programmatic creation and manipulation of PowerPoint presentations stored in OneDrive via Microsoft Graph. Use the toolkit to create presentations and slides, read and update speaker notes, export presentations to Markdown, and inspect the current user's PowerPoint environment.

**Capabilities**

- Create new presentations with a title slide in OneDrive.
- Append slides (including TWO_CONTENT layout) and support resumable uploads for files >4 MB.
- Read and write speaker notes in Markdown per slide or bulk (all slides at once).
- Download and convert presentations to Markdown, preserving text, tables, and chart data (images represented as placeholders).
- Query the current user and presentation environment (WhoAmI).

**OAuth**

Provider: microsoft

Scopes: Files.Read, Files.ReadWrite, User.Read

summary:
Microsoft PowerPoint toolkit (Arcade.dev) connects to Microsoft via OAuth and enables programmatic creation, modification, and inspection of PowerPoint files stored in OneDrive. It supports creating presentations and appending slides with common layouts, reading and updating speaker notes, and exporting presentation content to Markdown for automation or review.

**Capabilities**
- Create and modify presentations and slides, including common and two-column layouts, and append content programmatically.
- Read, set, and batch-retrieve speaker notes in Markdown with basic formatting preserved.
- Export/download presentations to Markdown (text, tables, chart data; media as placeholders) for downstream processing.
- Handle large-file uploads with resumable sessions and best-effort concurrency checks.

**OAuth**
Provider: microsoft
Scopes: Files.Read, Files.ReadWrite, User.Read
